description: This file defines a React-style component for displaying and interacting with a list of notes, including search, creation, and selection functionalities.

methods.name: wrapSearch
methods.description: A wrapper function that currently returns the input query unchanged.

methods.name: wrapCreate
methods.description: A wrapper function for creating a new note; currently returns true.

methods.name: wrapSelect
methods.description: A wrapper function that forwards the selected note ID.
